channel.title: Motivation on ERIC PEÑA
channel.description: Recent content in Motivation on ERIC PEÑA

item.title: Create Smarter Goals
item.description: If you are anything like me, passion and self-motivation compels you to generate ambitious goals. I sometimes even write them down and share them with friends and family. Then, I sit back and contentedly coddle myself in satisfaction for merely creating this goal hoping it will provide direction and purpose. I do this all while holding onto the illusion that I am responsibly evaluating my needs and assessing my possible futures.
